name: Home Alone: Ozzyla
description:
Controls:
· `A D` / `◄►` : Move
· `W` / `SPACE` / `▲` : Hold Jump
· `Z` / `B` : Run
· `X` / `N` : Catch Mouse
· `C` / `M` : Enter door

Instructions:
· You have limited life, you lose it by fighting Reina or by not eating
· You heal by eating wild animals (Birds and Mice)
· Reina, the dog, will pursue you after eating a wild animal.
· You can get rid of Reina by hiding in rooms!

Troubleshooting:
Q: I can't see any graphics or audio
A: Reload the page

Description:

You are ozzy, a tamed friendly cat.
Your owners are out of the house for a few days, you have all your food ready, and Reina, another "not so friendly" (For you) tamed dog is making sure you don't do anything you shouldn't.

Even thought Reina is there for making sure you don't go crazy, you just not simply follow rules, remember, you are a cat!

Your objective is to "survive" as much time eating wild animals on your owner's house (You think it's yours, but it isn't!), not letting Reina catch you.
If you fail you will have to (oh, the fate) eat the food your owners left.

Enjoy!
